sect1.title: Note
sect1.para: This chapter did not make it into this release. It is planned for the published release of this document.

sect1.title: Features and Benefits
sect1.para: We need feedback from people who are backing up samba servers. We would like to know what software tools you are using to backup your samba server/s.
In particular, if you have any success and / or failure stories you could share with other users this would be appreciated.
